articles.title: Defence stock jumps up to 5% after receiving an order worth ₹ 1600 Cr from Ministry of Defence - Trade Brains
articles.description: The share price of one of India’s leading warship builders gained around 5 percent to an intraday high of Rs 2,144.90 per share after the company received an order worth Rs 1,600 crore to build next-generation offshore patrol vessels.
